text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1947 Final was the 45th final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Montjuïc in Barcelona, on 22 June 1947, being won by Real Madrid CF, who beat RCD Español 2-0 after extra time. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|Real Madrid CF: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| José Bañón |- |DF ||2|| Clemente |- |DF ||3|| José Corona |- |MF ||4|| Guillermo Pont |- |MF ||5|| Juan Antonio Ipiña (c) |- |MF ||6|| Félix Huete |- |FW ||7|| Antonio Alsúa |- |FW ||8|| Sabino Barinaga |- |FW ||9|| Pruden |- |FW||10|| Luis Molowny |- |FW||11|| Pablo Vidal |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Baltasar Albéniz |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|RCD Español: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || José Trías |- |DF ||2|| José Casas |- |DF ||3|| José Mariscal (c) |- |MF ||4|| Ramón Celma |- |MF ||5|| Antonio Fàbregas |- |MF ||6|| Félix Llimós |- |FW ||7|| Rosendo Hernández |- |FW ||8|| Gabriel Jorge |- |FW ||9|| Ángel Calvo |- |FW||10|| Vicente Hernández |- |FW||11|| Ernesto Galobart |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| José Planas |- |} |} ==References== 1947 Copa Category:RCD Espanyol matches Category:Real Madrid CF matches
title: 1947 Copa del Generalísimo Final
